meanings.sent1: The wheatless bread was safe for people with gluten allergies.
meanings.sent2: She chose the wheatless option at the restaurant due to her dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent3: The wheatless field puzzled the farmer who was used to seeing golden wheat swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The wheatless diet opened up a whole new world of culinary possibilities for him.
meanings.sent5: The wheatless landscape looked barren but held hidden treasures for those who sought them.

meanings.sent1: The wheatless muffins tasted surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent2: The wheatless pasta was a hit among health-conscious consumers.
meanings.sent3: The wheatless garden was a quirky experiment that yielded unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: Her wheatless pantry sparked creativity in her cooking endeavors.
meanings.sent5: The wheatless fields stretched as far as the eye could see, devoid of the familiar golden stalks.
